channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Severe pothole, 25th August
item.description:
Severe pothole in Clifton Rd, can disable a car or dislodge a moped driver if driven over it at the wrong angle
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 37, Clifton Road, Welling, London

item.title: 35 Craven road with Brook Mews N dangerous corner, 25th August
item.description:
The single yellow line should be shortened and a double yellow line extended on Craven road at the corner with Brook Mews North. There is at weekend and evenings a car parked on the corner that makes it difficult and dangerous to come out of the Mews. If the double yellow was extended all the way to the first parking spot it would prevent parking so close to the corner preventing poor visibility when driving out of the Mews.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 33, Craven Road, Paddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Truman’s Road neglected: overflowing rubbish, fly tipping, unsafe conditions persist., 25th August
item.description:
Truman’s Road and Salcombe Road are consistently overflowing with rubbish, broken glass and fly tipping. Despite repeated reports, nothing has changed. Infrequent cleaning allows waste to accumulate, attracting rodents and foxes and worsening the problem.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Salcombe Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Mattress dumped on common at top of Bramblebury Rd, 25th August
item.description:
Constant flytipping at the start of the common at the top of Bramblebury rd. Residents are getting fed up now. Mattress now dumped. There’s also a hoover left on this part of the common near the bench.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: My street has not been swept for 5 weeks, 25th August
item.description:
I have complain lots of times. Are road never gets swept. Rude man told me once a month he does it. Not the case. 3 times a week. Someone needs to check his work? He leaves are street for months. Dog poo. Little weeds everywhere.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wetherell Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Stormwater drain blocked, 25th August
item.description:
A stormwater drain in front of the driveway at 78 Hayfield Road is blocked and needs clearing. It overflows when it rains. Would be good to unblock now while it’s dry.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 76, Hayfield Road, Poverest, London

item.title: White goods dumped in roadside by Valentine Avenue railway bridge crossing, 25th August
item.description:
This had previously been reported here. FixMyStreet ref: 8011026. I received an update to say it has been resolved and fixed, but it has not. The appliance is still dumped on the edge of the road. Your contractors may have told you they removed it, but they have not.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Valentine Avenue, Albany Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime Bikes parked outside Barcham House , Riversdale Rd, 25th August
item.description:
Everyday, especially weekends - Lime Bikes being left outside Barcham House, Riversdale Rd in road and on pavement, leaning against private residents railings. They block the pavement for pedestrians, disabled and prams.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Riversdale Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet
